programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit El Monte, Calif.; the Harris Brothers go into stealth mode; Jarrod and Brandi feel charitable; Darrell hopes a big pole will vault him to the top.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers look for great deals in Costa Mesa, Calif., an area that Dave knows all too well; Mary attempts to spend big; Darrell hopes to shut out a competitor.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Locker in the West
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi uncover a sweet locker in Santa Ana, Calif.; Mary looks for something more collectible; Darrell's find may equal another big win for the Gambler.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A locker in Whittier, Calif., features a high payoff; Dave eyes a unit with a stockpile of antiques; Barry's locker may contain old weapons.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura face tough competition in the neighborhood of North Hollywood; Dave's locker may be a hit; Mary eyes two units that, if purchased together, would make a perfect fit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers trek to Murietta, Calif.; Jeff Jarred resurfaces but that doesn't sit well with the Dotsons; Barry Weiss figures a couple things out; Jarrod and Brandi gamble on a unit and the results are electric.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy and Rene team up in an attempt to stop Darrell and Brandon's planned buying spree; a date reignites Jarrod and Brandi's passion for purchasing storage units.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: May the Vaults Be With You
programme.desc: The bidders attend a vault auction in Chatsworth, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi make noise with their purchase; Darrell finds treasure in Brandon's trash.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Gardena, Calif., the buyers gamble on a sportsman's locker and a load of construction equipment; Barry arrives with a secret weapon.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers gamble on storage units in Las Vegas; Darrell bets on a locker covered with blankets; Barry appraises a sign from the 1940s and makes a new friend.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Extra buyers descend upon Chatsworth, Calif., for a 100-vault auction; Mark goes in on a big group of lockers; Barry wonders if his newly acquired antiques will bring him serious cash.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Stanton, Calif.; Darrell is banned from an auction; Ivy Calvin lands a cool machine; Jarrod and Brandi flip for a dancer; Barry goes under cover.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers go to Moreno Valley, Calif.; Darrell tries to play nice; Barry Weiss lands an uncertain score.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders return to the Los Angeles neighborhood of Mission Hills; Dave begins his day $500 in the hole; Jarrod and Brandi find an extremely old item.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry brings along a butler when the bidders visit Orange, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi score a vintage lamp; Darrell sets a record for the most money spent on a unit in the show's history.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy hunts for high-end items in Moreno Valley; Jarrod reveals his alter ego to Brandi; Darrell flies solo; Rene has a close encounter with death.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy searches for high-end lockers; Rene and Casey clash over purchases; things get hairy for Jarrod and Brandi; Darrell plays old-fashioned pranks on his rivals.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders look for deals in Westminster, Calif.; Dave has discussions with the dead; Barry learns to stop worrying and love his lockers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In the desert climes of Lancaster, Calif., Nabila Haniss strikes it big while Dave Hester ends up feeling like a fifth wheel.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Homeland, Calif., is anything but friendly to the Harris Brothers; things heat up when Jarrod and Brandi loosen the purse strings.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Don't Bid So Close to Me
programme.desc: The buyers battle in Rancho Cucamonga, Calif.; Dave Hester arrives in a truck large enough to fit his ego; Jarrod and Brandi obtain a vintage mask; Barry Weiss scores with a rock 'n' roll legend.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Laura takes over as auctioneer when Dan calls in sick; Barry uncovers a "knock out" unit; Jarrod finds a locker with "gangsta" flavor; Darrell discovers a classic movie prop.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders revisit Lancaster, Calif.; Darrell battles Ivy on his turf; Barry buys some bowls; Jarrod and Brandi score DJ equipment.
